headline.main: Commuter With Measles Also Dined at Bay Area Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Commuter With Measles Also Dined at Bay Area Restaurant

docs.snippet: Officials say the commuter who may have exposed at least 1,500 Bay Area Rapid Transit riders to measles also ate at a popular Northern California restaurant....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officials say the commuter who may have exposed at least 1,500 Bay Area Rapid Transit riders to measles also ate at a popular Northern California restaurant.

headline.main: Mexico to Replace Embattled Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Mexico to Replace Embattled Attorney General

docs.snippet: Mexico's embattled attorney general, Jesus Murillo Karam, is leaving the post to take a new cabinet-level job as head of urban and rural development....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's embattled attorney general, Jesus Murillo Karam, is leaving the post to take a new cabinet-level job as head of urban and rural development.

headline.main: Nearly Half of Greeks Would Back Syriza in New Election: Poll
headline.print_headline: Nearly Half of Greeks Would Back Syriza in New Election: Poll

docs.snippet: Nearly half of Greeks would back the governing leftist party of Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras if elections were held this week, a Metron Analysis poll to be published on Saturday showed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly half of Greeks would back the governing leftist party of Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras if elections were held this week, a Metron Analysis poll to be published on Saturday showed.

headline.main: Three Infected With Measles at Las Vegas Seafood Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Three Infected With Measles at Las Vegas Seafood Restaurant

docs.snippet: Three new cases of measles have been confirmed in Las Vegas, in people believed infected by a contagious worker at an upscale MGM Grand Hotel and Casino seafood restaurant, Nevada public health officials said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three new cases of measles have been confirmed in Las Vegas, in people believed infected by a contagious worker at an upscale MGM Grand Hotel and Casino seafood restaurant, Nevada public health officials said on Friday.

headline.main: Political Consultant Sentenced to Over Seven Years for Stealing Funds
headline.print_headline: Political Consultant Sentenced to Over Seven Years for Stealing Funds

docs.snippet: Political consultant Kenneth "Buddy" Barfield was sentenced to 87 months in a federal prison for siphoning off more than $2.5 million in campaign funds from a Texas candidate running for a U.S. Senate seat, U.S. prosecutors said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Political consultant Kenneth "Buddy" Barfield was sentenced to 87 months in a federal prison for siphoning off more than $2.5 million in campaign funds from a Texas candidate running for a U.S. Senate seat, U.S. prosecutors said on Friday.

headline.main: MLS Fines Salt Lake Owner as Possible Work Stoppage Looms
headline.print_headline: MLS Fines Salt Lake Owner as Possible Work Stoppage Looms

docs.snippet: With a possible players strike or lockout on the horizon, Major League Soccer on Friday fined one of its team owners for making public comments on negotiations with the players' union (MLSPU)....
docs.lead_paragraph: With a possible players strike or lockout on the horizon, Major League Soccer on Friday fined one of its team owners for making public comments on negotiations with the players' union (MLSPU).

headline.main: Off-Duty NYPD Detective Killed in Wrong-Way Crash on Parkway
headline.print_headline: Off-Duty NYPD Detective Killed in Wrong-Way Crash on Parkway

docs.snippet: Authorities say an off-duty New York Police Department detective has been killed when a vehicle traveling the wrong way hit his SUV head-on....
